entries.title: Meta fined €390m over use of data for targeted ads
entries.description: The EU data watchdog says the way Meta obtained permission to process users' data for ads broke data law.

entries.title: Porn website age checks introduced in Louisiana
entries.description: US adult industry campaigners argue the law is the wrong solution.

entries.title: Gadgets unveiled at CES but Russia is banned
entries.description: Thousands have come to Las Vegas for one of the world's largest technology shows.

entries.title: Leeds leads drive to ensure 'no one left behind' in cost of living crisis
entries.description: Charities have warned millions could be forced to choose between heating, food and the internet.

entries.title: US regulators warn banks over cryptocurrency risks
entries.description: The announcement comes just two months after the collapse of FTX sent shockwaves through the industry.
